ai.title: AI Course Generator
ai.subtitle: Tell us what you want to learn, and our AI will create a customized course for you.
ai.label_term: What would you like to learn today?
ai.placeholder_about: Tell us about your background, experience level, etc.
ai.placeholder_goal: What do you hope to achieve by learning this topic?
ai.placeholder_custom_instructions: Any specific requirements or topics you want covered in the course?

landing.tagline: Your personalized learning companion for any topic
landing.level_up_desc: Get prepared for all your courses with benefits of the AI Tutor.
landing.heading: What can I help you learn?
landing.subheading: Enter a topic below to generate a personalized course for it
landing.placeholder_topic: e.g. JavaScript Promises, React Hooks, Go Routines etc
landing.explain_more: Explain more for a better course
landing.about_self_placeholder: e.g. I am a frontend developer and have good knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
landing.goal_label: What is your goal with this course?
landing.goal_placeholder: e.g. I want to be able to build Node.js APIs with Express.js and MongoDB.
landing.custom_instructions_placeholder: Give additional instructions to the AI as if you were giving them to a friend.

module-list.select_module_description: Please select a module from the sidebar to start learning.

ai-course-content.generating_course: Generating your course... This might take a minute.
ai-course-content.click_module_expand: Click on a module title to expand it, then select a lesson to view its content.

lesson-content.errorMessage: Error loading lesson content. Please try again.
lesson-content.loadingDescription: Your selected lesson is being prepared. Please wait while we generate content for lessons in sequence.

edit-prompt.modalDescription: Pass additional information to the AI to generate a lesson.
edit-prompt.textareaPlaceholder: e.g. make sure to add a section on React hooks
edit-prompt.completeSentenceText: Complete the sentence: I want AI to...

TestMyKnowledge.generatingQuiz: Generating your multiple choice quiz questions...
TestMyKnowledge.question: Question
